title: Manage Haul Truck Tire Performance
description: A tire specialist monitors the condition of haul truck tires to maximize their lifespan and avoid premature failures.

tasks.description: Retrieve real-time data from the tire pressure monitoring system (TPMS) for the entire truck fleet.
tasks.expected_outcome: A dashboard shows the current pressure and temperature of every tire.

tasks.description: Receive an alert for a tire on truck HT-25 that is running hot and losing pressure.
tasks.expected_outcome: The specialist acknowledges the alert, which indicates a potential problem.

tasks.description: Instruct the mine dispatcher to route the truck to the workshop immediately for a tire change to prevent a blowout.
tasks.expected_outcome: The truck is safely routed to the workshop, and a potentially dangerous tire failure is averted.
